pr_title: [RW-5930][risk=no] Turn on prod flags for new concept set search, cope and fitbit data

timeline.message: RW-5930 flipping flags for all new features

timeline.bodyText: Do we still need this since we now use the cdr context instead? Looks like we no longer use this anywhere in the UI, not sure about API.
timeline.author: dolbeew
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,11 +108,11 @@
     "useNewShibbolethService": true,
     "enableResearchPurposePrompt": false,
     "enableCohortBuilderV2": true,
-    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": false,
+    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": true,
     "enableReportingUploadCron": true,
-    "enableCOPESurvey": false,
+    "enableCOPESurvey": true,

replies.bodyText: You may be correct, but i say we leave it for now. We have several large cleanup task after all the new features are turned on in prod, so we can just clean it up then.
replies.author: freemabd

timeline.bodyText: Same as comment for enableCOPESurvey flag above, is this still needed?
timeline.author: dolbeew
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,11 +108,11 @@
     "useNewShibbolethService": true,
     "enableResearchPurposePrompt": false,
     "enableCohortBuilderV2": true,
-    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": false,
+    "enableConceptSetSearchV2": true,
     "enableReportingUploadCron": true,
-    "enableCOPESurvey": false,
+    "enableCOPESurvey": true,
     "enableCustomRuntimes": false,
-    "enableFitbit": false
+    "enableFitbit": true
